name: The Fire Case
description:
Souls-like Platformer

Someone has set the whole forest on fire! 

All of the animals are in danger and only Detective Nick Furry can find the culprit behind this case. Join our little fox detective on a platform journey filled with tricky puzzles and funny animals and find all of the clues and the loop hidden in the game.

Controls:

A/D - Movement Space - Jump I - Open Inventory E - Make trees fall W/S - Change the forest layer

Игра была разработана во время участия в геймджеме Ludum Dare 47 от Сообщества авторов “Индикатор”.
